```{r setup}
library(myLM)
```

To use function `myLM`:

```{r}
data("iris")
x = iris$Petal.Width
y = iris$Petal.Length
myLM(y~x)
# Equivalently
myLM(Petal.Length~Petal.Width, data = iris)




```
